snippet.title: Hasbro's BATTLESHIP
snippet.description:
The official version of the classic Hasbro board game of naval combat is on mobile! Challenge other players in Classic Mode or in the all-new Commanders Mode - a fast-paced, strategic and tactical variation. Play with unique naval commanders and use resources to activate powerful special abilities that will secure you a win as you wage war on the high seas.


Available on
- iOS : https://bit.ly/HasbroBattleship
- Android: https://bit.ly/HasbroBattleshipAndroid 

- Steam: https://bit.ly/HasbroBattleshipSteam
- NintendoSwitch eshop: https://bit.ly/BattleshipUS
